text: AWS was a key part of our solution
starting out and it's really because of

initially and how easy it was to start

scale is a partner that we've worked
with a lot in in the devops area in

automation the other thing that we
really have focused on is how how do we
set up the different environments to
ensure that we have good uptime with our
production Branch so as we look at iot
really the key part of that is being
able to provide service whether that's
toner whether that's MPS or providing
Remote Smart Diagnostics so technicians
can be efficient the iot requirements
are that these devices are are always
connected and so as we offer these
Services it's been fundamental that we
have the AWS iot component when Samsung
came to clear scale they needed help
with resour resources so we were able to
provide them clear scale devops
resources to help with our project as
the relationship developed where were
able to engage them on a much more

resources with leadership with strategic
planning and things of that sort some of
the earlier development was really on

they've done a number of things around
operations for us and driving devops and
how to optimize that with some some
tools we looked at and then most
recently we've done and are continuing
to do a lot of work in the space of iot
Samsung approached us to evaluate
multiple iot solutions for them there
was about five different solutions that
they wanted us to look at so we did a
very deep analysis of these Solutions
and compare side by side looking at
performance scalability cost use of
management and things like that and then
this was presented to Samsung leadership
to make a decision and um the great news
was that AWS was the winner and then we
were able to move forward and
architect automate and deploy for their
customers clear scale has really helped
us roll out some of these iot solutions
to our customers as well as doing a lot
of the cost profiling that's required so
that we could make good decisions on
whether to provide the iot apis using
our own deployment or whether to
Leverage The AWS implementation so the
the key benefits that that working with
clear scale has provided is is really
bringing in a broad range of expertise
because clear scale works with a number
of other companies they have experience
working on a broad range of different
solutions and their ideas bring
innovation into our team because they've
looked at things that are in a
completely different solution space than
than we're working in the other thing is
they have the ability to scale rapidly
based on our needs so B depending on the
needs of of our team some months we may
need a number of resources 3 months
later the the resource load may be lower
and it provides us this kind of
flexibility to really provide things um
and shorten our time to Market
